name: Catch The Present
description:
*CUSTOMIZATION COMING SOON*

!!!NOT WORKING: 🖥 For PC, Mac and Linux you need to DOWNLOAD the “.zip” file from below this description, then extract it and click on the “.exe” file!

📱For MOBILE you can play in the BROWSER by tapping “Run Game”!

❗️If you are playing on SAFARI (iPhone) then make sure to click the “aA”  button near the search bar and then “Hide Toolbar” before clicking “Run Game”. This is so that itch.io doesn’t get full of bugs.

A pretty chill game! Try and catch as many presents as you can but be careful... everything starts to speed up!

This game was made in 48 HOURS!

Screenshhot and share your highest scores on Twitter @lucadev_x and @neonloop_neo!

Project Director: LucaDev (YT: https://youtube.com/channel/UCVBPl6kJzWi5y-vwsWAr_hw)

Neonloop Studios on YouTube: https://youtube.com/channel/UC1r34YfiIDjh6XEJ4mEmXvw

PRESENTS: they fall from the sky and you must catch them or else you will loose your hearts!

SHIELDS: they also fall from the sky and they give you an extra layer of protection against unsuccessful catches and bombs… wait what?! You can only have 1 shield at a time!

BOMBS: yeah, you heard right! Those drop from the sky as well but if you catch them you’ll regret it!

COOKIES: Santa always likes some nice crunchy cookies. Everything falls from the sky but these ones regenerate your hearts (not your shield)!
